title: Wear Bottle Spinner
summary: The Bottle Spinner Game for Android Wear!
description: Do you know what is the "Bottle Spinner Game"?Well, now you can have a random choice tool right on your wrist!
descriptionHTML:
Do you know what is the "Bottle Spinner Game"?

Well, now you can have a random choice tool right on your wrist!
comments: Spinning? What is that?xD doesn't spin at all. Just sits there. All you can do is change the bottle type.

Nice but Why don't you make it go faster when we click the screen? I would give one more star. The other would go for being able to select the kind of bottle we want. Jack Daniels drinking game idea. And the ground as well for sure.
I don't have a WEAR device But I see slot of people giving one star because they don't bore that they need a WEAR device! Support WEAR app makers!
Nice I feel good,simple game ,good luck
Fun and simple Cool animation and free!
